SiX-P4cK - (09:37): yeah  
SiX-P4cK - (09:37): hi  
SiX-P4cK - (09:37): 2 days to make a f\*cking hql request  
SiX-P4cK - (09:38): but it's work now ^^  
jbrBridge - (09:38): [Cindy Mitchell] lame. o:  
jbrBridge - (09:38): [Cindy Mitchell] yay. ^^  
SiX-P4cK - (09:38): SELECT firstname.value || ' ' || lastname.value FROM BaseObject usr, BaseObject grp, StringProperty mbr, StringProperty firstname, StringProperty lastname WHERE usr.className='XWiki.XWikiUsers' AND grp.className = 'XWiki.XWikiGroups' AND grp.name = 'XWiki.DEV-TeamLeaderGroup' AND grp.id = mbr.id AND mbr.value = usr.name AND firstname.name = 'first\_name' AND firstname.id = usr.id AND lastname.name = 'last\_name' AND lastname.id = usr  
jbrBridge - (09:39): [Cindy Mitchell] wow. o:  
SiX-P4cK - (09:39): yeah  
SiX-P4cK - (09:39): juste display firstname and lastname filter by group un a class property  
SiX-P4cK - (09:39): look like simple  
evalica joined #xwiki at 09:40  
SiX-P4cK - (09:41): jbrBridge: you was @ devoxx?  
jbrBridge - (09:42): [Cindy Mitchell] o.o  that was for me? or..?  
SiX-P4cK - (09:43): yes  
SiX-P4cK - (09:44): <jbrBridge> is your nickname  
jbrBridge - (09:45): [Cindy Mitchell] o:  someone needs to fix that, lolz.  
jbrBridge - (09:45): [Cindy Mitchell] cos it's not sending nicknames, lol.  
jbrBridge - (09:45): [Cindy Mitchell] 'cos I'm a girl. o:  
jbrBridge - (09:45): [Cindy Mitchell] lolz-  
jbrBridge - (09:45): [Cindy Mitchell] (8/11/2010 3:41:25 AM) ircBridge: [SiX-P4cK] jbrBridge: you was @ devoxx?  
jbrBridge - (09:45): [Cindy Mitchell] (8/11/2010 3:42:07 AM) Cindy Mitchell: o.o  that was for me? or..?  
jbrBridge - (09:46): [Cindy Mitchell] no, I didn't go.. o:  
jbrBridge - (09:46): [Cindy Mitchell] call me Ritsu, though- lol.  
SiX-P4cK - (09:47): a xwiki girl :D  
jbrBridge - (09:48): [Cindy Mitchell] lol, yah. :D  
jbrBridge - (09:48): [Cindy Mitchell] ritsu, as in <ritsu\_x\_mio> (my IRC nickname, lol)  
arkub joined #xwiki at 09:48  
SiX-P4cK - (09:49): beacause you use jabber to connect on irc  
jbrBridge - (09:49): [Cindy Mitchell] I connect to IRC every now and again, lol.

sdumitriu - (12:43): abusenius: Pong  
abusenius - (12:43): hi  
sdumitriu - (12:44): Hi  
abusenius - (12:45): (re language parameter escaping) you've said some time ago that it would be better to only allow valid language codes in language  
abusenius - (12:45): and not xml-escape it  
sdumitriu - (12:45): Yes  
sdumitriu - (12:45): I have a small patch for this  
abusenius - (12:46): language parameter causes 220 escaping errors in escaping-tests/ :)  
abusenius - (12:46): (out of 570 tests)  
abusenius - (12:47): I was thinking about fixing it so that it does not pollute the results  
sdumitriu - (12:47): diff --git a/xwiki-core/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/doc/XWikiDocument.java b/xwiki-core/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/doc/XWikiDocument.java  
sdumitriu - (12:47): index 0e8a64a..d821a8b 100644  
sdumitriu - (12:47): --- a/xwiki-core/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/doc/XWikiDocument.java  
sdumitriu - (12:47): +++ b/xwiki-core/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/doc/XWikiDocument.java  
sdumitriu - (12:47): @@ -41,7 +41,9 @@ import java.util.Iterator;  
sdumitriu left at 12:47 (Excess Flood  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 12:47  
sdumitriu - (12:47): WTF? I'm a registered operator, how do I flood the chat?  
abusenius - (12:47): :D  
sdumitriu - (12:49): cjdelisle: Can you start the vote for our next committer, I have a plain to catch  
sdumitriu - (12:49): abusenius: I've mailed you my tiny patch  
sdumitriu - (12:50): Can you see if it works and if it needs further changes?  
abusenius - (12:50): I'll take a look  
sdumitriu - (12:50): K, going  
sdumitriu - (12:50): Bye  
sdumitriu left at 12:50 (Client Quit  
abusenius - (12:50): bye
